channel.title: Powerful Survey Analytics on Online survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Powerful Survey Analytics on Online survey data analysis

item.title: Scalability
item.description:
• Instantly search across all your datasets
  • Empower anyone to analyze or view findings
  • Quickly and broadly deploy easy-to-build dashboards

item.title: Simplicity
item.description:
• Analyze data with little or no training
  • Create tables and charts
  • Filter data
  • Build dashboards in 5 minutes
  • Empower customers and clients to answer their own questions

item.title: Speed
item.description: The CrunchDB columnar database is purpose built to handle even your largest survey datasets with millions of respondents and thousands of variables.

item.title: Tool
item.description:
Unlike generic BI tools, Crunch.io handles:

  • Weighting
  • Missingness
  • Stats testing
  • Multiple response questions
  • Advanced analytics
